metadata.title: SwiftBuild - Websites, SEO, Google Ads
metadata.description: Modern websites, SEO optimization and Google Ads campaigns. One team, one goal. Free quote.

problem.title: Sound familiar?
points: Your website looks like it's from 2015
The ad agency blames the website. The web agency blames the ads.
You pay for "marketing" but don't know what exactly
You want to change something on the site and wait 2 weeks
problem.solution_text: One company. Website, SEO and ads. If something doesn't work — it's our problem, not yours.

services.title: What we do
services.subtitle: We focus on three things — and do them well.

seo.title: SEO
seo.description: Be visible on Google for your customers

step1.title: Conversation
step1.description: Tell us about your business. We'll understand your goals and prepare a quote.

step2.title: Execution
step2.description: We design and build the site. You approve, we deploy. Done in 2-3 weeks.

step3.title: Results
step3.description: We launch SEO and ads. We monitor, optimize, and report.

about.title: About us
about.description: We build websites that work. We're not a big agency with a conference room and account manager. We're two people who get things done.
about.contact_line: You call — Karol answers. Something breaks — Wouter fixes it. No passing between departments. No waiting for "team response".

karol.bio: Business Analyst at Colliers. Will understand your business and take care of every detail.

wouter.bio: Senior developer with experience in e-commerce, AI and web applications. Your site in good hands.

point1.title: Everything in one place
point1.description: Website, SEO, ads. No unnecessary middlemen.

point3.title: Talk to people, not a company
point3.description: You know us by name, we know your business.

form.name: Name
form.success: Thanks! We'll get back to you faster than you think.
form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

footer.tagline: Website, SEO and ads. One team, one goal.
